name: Connectle
description:
Challenge the AI to disc-dropping fun with the classic game of Connect 4! Start to play with a game already started. Drop your yellow discs in the grid and be the first to get 4 in a row to win. If the AI is getting too close to 4 in a row, block them with your own disc!

A new CONNECTLE will be available each day!

Share the result with your friends.
